item.title: PUZZLE 1 : Part 2/3 : SOLUTION : Patterns in ARC-AGI
item.description: Below is the correct input / output for this puzzle. As you can see you need to recognise that there is a repeating pattern. This task is very easy for humans but can easily fool computers. Input (Task) Output (Solution)
